article.title: Matched Betting
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Matched betting is possibly one of the easiest and most lucrative ways of making money online. The process is completely legal and, if executed properly, completely risk-free.

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…
authors.name: Tom Rodrigues

next.title: Thermal Screening
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: Many borders have introduced thermal screening in an attempt to prevent the spread of COVID-19. However, evidence shows that this type of screening is ineffective.

next.title: My DIY Smart Misting System
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: Misting systems are a great way to cool down outside spaces during the heat of summer. Making our won smart misting system is cheap and easy.
